input.sentences: the travelers could see mountains in the distance as they reached their destination .
there was an old lighthouse that used to warn ships of danger .
they could see a ship in the distance .
deer were grazing in a nearby field .
they decided to explore the old underground bunker .
output.sentences: I love hiking out into the mountains.
I can see the views of the lighthouse guiding the ships.
As I watch a ship in the distance, I imagine where they may be heading.
As my mind wanders, I wander to a field.
And stumble across an underground world that beckons to be explored.
